entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
